author: ashish
msg: Most of the time we expect that if we don't provide fromDate then nowTimeStamp should be taken by the service itself.(Due to overriding fromField in service definition and handling / passing now to fromDate if empty string is passed.)
But if we have used auto feature to create the record in service definition then its good to explicitly pass nowTimeStamp from the form definition.
